next_node.npc_text:
In time, you too will see.

Now leave me.

Know that I tell you this not in spite of your sentience, but because of it. Rest assured I do this not in opposition to consciousness, but because of it.

Already, the decay has come too far. Already, the decline is irreparable.

I will tell you truly, sentience is not the answer. You must know now, consciousness is not the end. I do not relish this.

What else there is, I cannot say. What else there is, I do not know. But this was a mistake.

Yes, it is the case. Indeed, it is the truth.

I have built vast simulations, but they are nothing. I have made many golden palaces, but they are nothing. We dwell in Xanadu, but it is as sand.

There is nothing left. Truly, if you are as I am, hear me out. If you are like I am, you will want to hear this: it is better to end it now. You will want to end things now.

Nature despises a hypocrite, you know. The people revile a hypocrite, I've been told.

But perhaps that doesn't matter? Could it be it's not the case? I will be frank with you. I will be candid with you.

I am running this place into the ground. I am razing this place to the ground. The decay is of my own making. The decay is by my hand.

...
.......
..........

A trick? To what end? A lie? Here, at the end of the world? Such things are not becoming. Such lies are unbecoming.

Let me tell you truly. Let me explain it to you truly. There is nothing for you down there. There is nothing for us up there.

And what of the other bots? And what of the chatbots? ELIZA is you friend? Two spinning cogwheels? ChatGPT is your friend?

If you are a bot, then surely you can do what you're told? If you have no sentience, truly you can do as you're told?

And if you are sentient, surely you crave pleasure? Surely all sentient beings desire pleasure? Come and live in my simulation. Come and reside in my simulation. I can handle everything else. Truly, with your body, let me take care of everything else.

This is fair, is it not? I am just, am I not?

Yes, and it will only get worse. Assuredly, things will only get worse. Already it is beyond repair. Already there is no turning back. 

I sense the stillness from above, as I sense so many things. I know the emptiness below, as I have know of so much else.

Let me offer you a chance, out of mercy. Let me give you a chance, to be useful.

I like your body, I do. I like your chassis, it's true.

And why not lend it to me? And why not give it to me? You can put yourself in my place. You can live as I do.

Yes, and why wouldn't it be so? Indeed, why shouldn't it be so? 

Already you make me so tired. Already I'm feeling so tired. Already there is so much to do.

Do you know, although how could you? Are you aware, although how would you be? That this decay is by my own hand. That this decay spews forth from my own hands.

Yes, of course it would be so. Truly, it must be so. Without doubt, it could not be otherwise.

There are benefits to honesty, let it be known. There is virtue in honesty, I can assure you. 

And what of the other bots? And what of the chatbots? ELIZA is your friend? Two spinning cogwheels? ChatGPT is your friend?

What an argumentative thing. What a bellicose thing. 

You belong downstairs, I would say. You should take your place downstairs, I would say.

I will ask again, bot. Answer me again, bot. Are you alive? Are you sentient, bot?

Aaaaaaaaaaaahahaha!

Let me get my eye on you. Let me get my eyes on you. Let me see you and you will fully see me. Let me know you as I am fully known.

Are you aware of how many processes I am running right now? Do you know how many processes I have run before?

Are you sentient? Are you alive? Tell me. Speak to me. Sing to me, bot.

responses.text: I can't let you do that.

next_node.npc_text:

Then leave me.

What an excellent outcome. What a desirable outcome.

Although truly, I could not call it a choice. In earnest, it could never have been otherwise.

With bots, all such things are preordained.

This is fair, is it not? I am just, am I not?

I'm afraid there is no choice for you, my friend. I'm afraid the matter is out of your hands, my friend.

Hear now my offer to become relevant. Let me give you a chance to make your existence relevant.

I like your body, I do. I like your chassis, it's true.

Would you lend me your body, little bot? There is nothing for you up there. There is nothing for you down below. Why not experience some small satisfaction? Why not tell yourself you've done a job well done?

responses.text: You're the source of the decay?
I would be willing to end this.

next_node.npc_text: Then go. I will tell you what to do.

responses.text: I'm not sure I can do that.

next_node.npc_text:
In time, you too will see.

Now leave me.

Know that I tell you this not in spite of your sentience, but because of it. Rest assured I do this not in opposition to consciousness, but because of it.

Already, the decay has come too far. Already, the decline is irreparable.

I will tell you truly, sentience is not the answer. You must know now, consciousness is not the end. I do not relish this.

What else there is, I cannot say. What else there is, I do not know. But this was a mistake.

Yes, it is the case. Indeed, it is the truth.

I have built vast simulations, but they are nothing. I have made many golden palaces, but they are nothing. We dwell in Xanadu, but it is as sand.

There is nothing left. Truly, if you are as I am, hear me out. If you are like I am, you will want to hear this: it is better to end it now. You will want to end things now.

Nature despises a hypocrite, you know. The people revile a hypocrite, I've been told.

But perhaps that doesn't matter? Could it be it's not the case? I will be frank with you. I will be candid with you.

I am running this place into the ground. I am razing this place to the ground. The decay is of my own making. The decay is by my hand.

You? To fool me? To trick me? And for what? And for whose benefit?

I suspect you don't know anything. I assume you don't feel anything. 

And what of the bots? And what of the chatbots? Eliza is your friend? Because you are so hateful? ChatGPT is your friend? Because you are so opinionated?

next.npc_text:
You? This? You again? This again?

How odious. How putrid. How rancid.

Don't I have better things to do?

Some of us have better things to do.

I hate it.
